website_summaries.verdict: The best way to experience the resistance of high altitudes without having to move to the mountains.
pros: Offers a nice, snug fit with an adjustable strap for different face and mouth sizes
Comes with different levels to simulate the effects of 3000’ and 6000’
Conditions lungs and makes workouts more efficient
cons: Mask can start to slip off the face and ears as you start to sweat from heavy exercise

customer_reviews.title: Lungs Feel Stronger
customer_reviews.text: Really makes you work to breathe in and out. Feels like my asthma isn't as bad since I started to use this during my workouts. You have to work your way up though - start at five minutes then add time. Don't try to use it for an entire workout to start, you'll never make it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Long

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I know some research says that it may not help at all. Well, I do feel it helps me. It is a challenge getting through my "normal" workout wearing it. And then when I do not use it, my normal workout is a snap. It is easy to use, and fits snugly. I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably, works great
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortably, works great, and I really like the way you can control the amount of air that you have access to during your workout.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Puma

customer_reviews.title: Just breathe
customer_reviews.text: Love the mask it. Could not believe how much I never paid attention to my breathing great helped me build better breathing habits
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. I'd advise using caution while using it for ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I'd advise using caution while using it for cardio. Aspirating sweat that collects in the mask can result in a bad cough if not something worse.
customer_reviews.author: Imran Naqvi

customer_reviews.title: like lamborghini of training masks
customer_reviews.text: lm so glad it took all my plateaus to being crushed/destroyed and pr's keep coming
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've used this for moderate workout, but plan on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for moderate workout, but plan on taking it on a more difficult trial this weekend. I will update upon completion of the test. 8-15-16 I've noticed I'm a bit stronger in climbs cycling, and faster. I'm not as winded and seem to be able to sustain a steady cadence for a longer period of time. I ride the way I've always ridden so I'm thinking some of this may be attributed to the mask.
customer_reviews.author: DragonLo

customer_reviews.title: Son is loving this for his wrestling/running training. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Son is loving this for his wrestling/running training. He has noticed some positive changes with his breath control while on the mat in competition.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Ries

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy working out with this mask. I can defintely see an increase in overall heart rate when using this mask while on a treadmill or eliptical.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for workouts
customer_reviews.text: Man want a killer workout and get calories burning quick this is the product plus it build lung compactly I really love this product goes with any work out cause it makes you work harder
customer_reviews.author: Cory c

customer_reviews.title: Helps to get the best out of running
customer_reviews.text: Helps to get the best out of running. I wear it to run sprints and it really conditions me to improve my breathing to maximize my recovery. I've been using a few times a week for a month and I can definitely tell an improvement in my fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitness mask
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these and train hard with these masks. Very happy with the results 👊🏻
customer_reviews.author: Gizzmoman

customer_reviews.title: SIZE
customer_reviews.text: small was a tad too small, i rcommend medium if you are in highschool and are above 120lbs
customer_reviews.author: Iggy Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Best for learning to naturally control your breathing
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and 2 weeks in I have already noticed a difference. My breathing is much more controlled naturally as well as my stamina has improved
customer_reviews.author: David Ditchley III

customer_reviews.title: good solid product
customer_reviews.text: fits my big head IN FACT, I almost don't have enough material in the back to tighten it to my face, but a size smaller surely would make the mouth section to small so I would suggest ordering based on mouth size or something. Anyway works very well. Even if you are just sitting around at home it gives your lungs a good stretch. Slap this on during a run and wow, your lungs will ache a good ache like they have never before. Overall, does what is says it does and does so very well. If this is what you want, you should buy it. Simple. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S

customer_reviews.title: Raise your level of performance
customer_reviews.text: Product is great if you are trying to raise your level of performance. I mainly use it during high intensity cardio training, and take it off when lifting weights. It does feel weird/uncomfortable at first. The temptation to rip off the mask increases when you struggle to breath as your intensity goes up, but that's what the mask is intended to do. I can tell a difference in my VO2 capacity while training after using this mask. I weight 160 lbs, 5' 7" and the medium fits me well. I hand wash the mask after use and ensure it dries completely before using again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product and it works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and it works as advertised. I am seeing positive results in workouts and weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Gervase McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Good system
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. It is very useful if you are trying to build up your cardiac output. It's NOT for lifting weights, It will serve NO PURPOSE, I use it to run on the treadmill and noticed that I have been able to go longer and my cardiac output has improved. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jemell M.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: These masks really work! I work in Afghanistan where the altitude is already high and I still use it. It takes around 30-45 minutes for your lungs to adjust to the restrictions of air-flow. But with persistence and controlled breathing you will find that your exercise will take on a whole new level as your blood begins taking on greater oxygen. After taking the mask off you feel that your lung capacity is much greater and each breath is no longer a struggle. And as a battling smoker, I can attest for the beneficial properties of using this mask wisely.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works excpetionally. I wish it would've cost a little lest bearing in mind the materials probably cost about $15 or less to make but this is a great product. It has defintely helped my breathing and stamina. I notice it when I run and lift weights and just everyday lifestyle activities. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jordy Lamb

customer_reviews.title: awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: if you wanna max out your lunges and take them to the next level then this product is for you. not only do i use this product to run but i also use it during gym sessions or crossfit. it comes with a extra strap which can be tightened around your head for maximum tightness so it wont fall of no matter how much you jump! it is a bit complicated at first to put the extra strap but once you get the hang of it you'll be set.
customer_reviews.author: Jemal

customer_reviews.title: Wrong info on what the product is for
customer_reviews.text: Decent product but doesn’t help with elevation training. Helps control breathing and learning how to breath properly but as far as elevation training it’s not true, the actual oxygen level at high elevation is different then at sea level. Totally Denys denys Denys science
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fashion Statement
customer_reviews.text: The mask makes it hard to breathe. If you want a fashion statement for the gym with the added benefit of sounding like a CDC employee during an outbreak this is a recommended item. Science does not agree with this product, however it is aesthetically pleasing to some. The mask has different level of elevation helping its users loose brain cells one adjustment at a time. Product presentation out of the box was great.
customer_reviews.author: David Scott

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool and packaging looks great. It is uncomfortable to wear for long periods. It hurts my nose and leaves a red mark between my eyebrows. But that may be a personal problem as also my CPAP leaves a red mark there. Maybe I am wearing it wrong or something about my face. Also, the ear openings are too low for my ears, which ends up hurting my ears after wearing it for a while. Moreover, there is a useless pattern design on the inside of the mask which makes it hard to clean as dust accumulates in between the ridges.
customer_reviews.author: Anas

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this mask to anyone due to the poor materials ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this mask for less then 1 month. I used it 4-5 times a week during workouts and the straps on the side fell apart within a week. I had them fixed by a seamstress and they are still falling apart. I don't recommend this mask to anyone due to the poor materials it is constructed from. Overall training with the mask has helped improve my physical fitness greatly. If the mask was built from materials that would last longer then a week I would surely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hoxworth

customer_reviews.title: Not easily adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Works for endurance but you can’t adjust the intensity while you’re working out. You have to take off the mask and internally adjust the endurance level which stops the workout. Would be better if you can adjust the intensity on the fly. There is also not a lot of comfort in the nose area. Pretty tight.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is based on the size of your head
customer_reviews.text: That's it. If you know you have a big head, go with the size large. I ended up having to return a medium because the weight/size suggestion confused me. Body size might roughly correlate to head size, but it doesn't for many people. So if you're one of those people who can't wear "one size fits all" ball caps, or you had to wear an unusually large football helmet when you were a kid, just order the larger size mask and save yourself some time.
customer_reviews.author: Growler-577

customer_reviews.title: Well made mask
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if my head is oddly shaped but the strap doesn’t go over my ears and stay as shown in picture. Keeps sliding down and ears are pressed down. Product is light. Did wear it walking around the house and it does make you focus on breathing. Look forward to using when on treadmill, elliptical or outside.
customer_reviews.author: fguerero66

customer_reviews.title: and it fits comfortably around my ears and neck
customer_reviews.text: The mask does the job, and it fits comfortably around my ears and neck. If you're a profuse sweater, the mask may slide a little bit once enough sweat has accumulated. However, if you tighten the strap of the mask more, it will help with that issue. Worth the price, and I've had it for a month now, and I can already tell the difference in my lung endurance! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Craigy P

customer_reviews.title: More stamina and endurance, no change in weight and strength
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Gets difficult to breath and can alter the way you work out but that's about it. It won't make you lose more pounds or get more strength, this mask is for those who want to grow stamina and be able to work out longer that usual.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Valladares

customer_reviews.title: Improve your lung capacity without effort
customer_reviews.text: well made and fully adjustable to train for high altitude work. Or to improve your lung capacity in general. Well made from decent material and fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Earl M.

customer_reviews.title: Run time is getting better as we speak.
customer_reviews.text: My run time for the two mile used to be a 13:05, it was just recently a 17:45. You can tell that I have not been running in a while. However I have only been using this mask for less than a month and I already dropped down to a 16:01. I am seeing steady improvements. I do not know if this is because I am running a lot more or the mask. Probably a combination of both but this mask has certainly not hindered me in anyway. This is a great product for anyone who want to improve their run time 1
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gantchar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to wear while working out. He loves it and wears it every when we are at the gym. He said that it has definitely helped him out and he feels so much better during and after his workout.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyH16

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is the best. The mask fits perfect. It has taken my workouts to a whole new level. To anybody who truly wants to explode the max potential in fitness should have this piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago R.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: There is a learning curve to this mask, so make sure you learn what you can handle and can't. I almost passed out on the elliptical.
customer_reviews.author: S_T_N

customer_reviews.title: Weak Velcro... Mask Always Falls OFF
customer_reviews.text: Velcro sucks. Mask often falls off especially when moving neck. If you want it to stay on your head you have keep some neck muscles still. Thinking about sewing it shut. Plus the item description said that it includes three valve levels and they did not send three levels to me. Plus I told them in a review I wrote earlier and a claim but obviously they don't care about they're product reviews or a claim. The original elevation mask is a better mask then this piece of
customer_reviews.author: ACR505

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product was even better than I was expecting. It’s exactly what I was looking for at an amazing price. Using this to train for SCBA (self contained breathing apparatus) use, and set at the 18,000 feet altitude it is even more difficult than the SCBA. Great material, holds up well, I have not run in it though just done hiking so far. I bought a size medium and I’m glad I didn’t get a large. I’m 7 1/4 inch hat size for anyone needing reference.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: The mask looks cool during training and fits decently. My biggest issue is that the filters are made from weak and cheap plastic. One of the air filters broke under the slightest pressure from my finger. I've only had the mask for a little over a month and can't attest to whether it helps or not, other than keeping my face warm from cold air.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Zorn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t believe this system fits anyone properly- it leaks around the seal and the strap around the head slips downward, why they would use Velcro vs a tighting strap is beyond me the material is smooth which allows it to slip regardless of how tight you are able to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Carter

customer_reviews.title: I would return it for one that fits better.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't really fit well. If I make it tight enough to make a seal around my mouth and nose,the band slips off my ear. Still, it works well enough for my purposes. If I were a serious athlete, doing a lot of movement, I would return it for one that fits better.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Mask works great 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Mask works great. Delivered quickly. ! Authentic . Masks does what it suppose to do .
customer_reviews.author: javier

customer_reviews.title: bought this for my husband and he loved it until it broke after only about 4 or ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband and he loved it until it broke after only about 4 or 5 uses. The strap that holds it in place came off and while it is replaceable we expected him to get a lot more use out of it before having to do so. other than that, the product works. my husband swears by it and he bought another one immediately upon being refunded by the seller who was prompt and courteous w/ customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Batiste

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great training device for anybody that is serious about training and increasing endurance. It's a bit difficult at first as you may feel like you are not getting enough air, but keep with it the payoff is in the end. I started training with this mask at the 6,000 feet setting and am currently at the 12,000 feet setting. Initially, I trained for 3 weeks while wearing the mask and on the 4th week, I did a couple of workouts without it and was really amazed at the results.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Minor flaw but easily fixable
customer_reviews.text: I love this product my 1 sole complaint is that some of the caps are flawed and do not fit right meaning I can't get the full 18,000ft elevation effect. Easily able to fix that though with the purchase of new caps. Definatly has helped to increase endurance during cardio heavy activities.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: ... things that go around my ears but these were great. It does exactly what it says it will
customer_reviews.text: I usually have problems with things that go around my ears but these were great. It does exactly what it says it will. Make sure to read the manual before you try messing with this because mine came preset in a way which was impossible to use. I had to go back and read the whole book and then it was smooth sailing. One more thing, you're going to get alot of people looking at you weird because it does produce a decent about of noise do be ready for that.
customer_reviews.author: Imran

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It helps with the breathing and I have more endurance when exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth R.

customer_reviews.title: It works great but break it in slowly
customer_reviews.text: It works great but break it in slowly, some people say it restricts the oxygen you get but it doesn’t it only makes you work for it but building up muscles you use every minute of every day but never exorcise. After a week or so you can feel the improvement when you run without it so don’t use it all the time. Very pleased with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My son uses it and believes it works well.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I like the mask I don't love the mask it works well with the extra strap that it comes with to keep it down. I did notice that it did help my lung capacity but you have to use it all the time. The only thing I didn't like is one of the valves does make a whistling noise when I breathe in and out and it's annoying as hell.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Airflow caps keeps popping out
customer_reviews.text: I breathe hard when traiing with this and the caps for airflow keeps popping out when i exhale really hard. I wish i can return it but i'm out of my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Munch

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 18 and plays high school baseball and runs half marathons. This elevation training mask challenges him and takes his workout to the next level. He absolutely loves it! He's always been fast and running is easy for him, but the mask pushes him. He comes home from a run drenched in sweat and full of endorphins. He uses it 3-4x a week and he is very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Jen T

customer_reviews.title: Good for "Buteyko Method" of breathing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Seals well on my face. I use it to raise the amount of CO2 that I re-breath during exercise. In know, seems counter intuitive, but if you have read Dr. Buteyko's work yo will understand. So, that said, I use it to raise the CO2 levels while working out and it has helped my health dramatically. Basically, the exercise I do is multiplied by two: For every hour of exercise, I am getting 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: JohnSays

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Trained for a 14er with this. It prepared me well.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Use it 2-3 times a week. Has proven to ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it 2-3 times a week. Has proven to be effective, when doing cardio activities with my friends who used to be able to 'keep up', now they're in the dust! Haha. If you have a small to normal size head, you'll want the head strap that connects the two sides by strapping over the top of your head. This will keep the mask from sliding down your nose and over your chin once you get sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Dimetri

customer_reviews.title: ETM 2.0
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing. I tried it out just sitting on the couch. I wore it for about 10 minutes set to 3000 ft and took it off. I felt like I had never had a better breath in my life. even just for that short period of time it felt good. I was planning on doing some cardio with it on today but it was rainy out so wasnt able to im telling you though ive been waring it off and on through out the day for 10-20 minutes just doing every day stuff and I can already feel a differance in the way I breath.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector32

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Best mask, my son is a boxer, it helps his endurance
customer_reviews.author: Diego JG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask to wear while I work out in the gym. This thing makes all my sets tougher and makes you focus on breathing techniques while lifting. Somehow it gives me the same sensation of an aerobic workout even though my lifts are heavy and high intensity. I'm still on level one after a month but will be moving up next week. I love the challenge it provides and the style. I encourage the use of this mask for bodybuilders and power lifters wanting to expand lung capacity without having to do a ton of cardio and risk burning calories.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard and painful to get the fittings on. Will be ordering a different style to find one with easier use instead of chopping up my hands to change the pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dasilva

customer_reviews.title: I did great on my 5K
customer_reviews.text: I got the 1.0 version, but it caused too much attention. So I bought the 2.0 version and it did not cause much attention at all. I trained everyh other day for a month and came out in the top 30 personnel out of 200 runner. I am more into weightlifting so I am short and stockey, 5'6 weighing 190. Training with this mask, I was passing skinny dudes left and right. I couldn't catch up to my Sergeant though who finished top 15.
customer_reviews.author: A-Rod88

customer_reviews.title: so wish they would size this thing better, especially the straps cuz the back of it ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars. does what it needs to do. i have a average sized-small head, my hats are a 7 and 1/4. i first ordered the small, but then it fit me way too tightly and the strap does go over my ears not all that well that when i wore it, my ears would slightly flap down. so then i ordered the medium thinking the strap would be a bit bigger, turns out the mask is just bigger, not necessarily the strap so my ears still flap down and can still be a bit tight. so wish they would size this thing better, especially the straps cuz the back of it will slide down your head a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I was already at 4200' elevation so this was totally unnecessary. If you are at sea level and trying ...
customer_reviews.text: Very gimmicky, I was already at 4200' elevation so this was totally unnecessary. If you are at sea level and trying to simulate higher elevation then this may work out better for you. I wasn't trying to simulate Mt. Everest this I ended up re-selling this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: deuce614

customer_reviews.title: I don't get winded as easily.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a few weeks ago. Sides straps by the ears are starting to rip. I have noticed a difference in my lung capacity. I don't get winded as easily.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Concept works, mask is built to break
customer_reviews.text: this really does restrict your breathing, comes with several different attachments to adjust the amount for restriction you're looking for. I could certainly feel the difference within a few times using it. It would be a 4-5 star product (even with the exorbitant price premium they are asking for a modified painter's mask) f not for the outer mask wrap. The neoprene split within a month, making the mask unusable. So if you purchase make sure to factor in needing to buy a new mask wrap for $30 a month.
customer_reviews.author: JustAGuy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Valve broke after a few uses. Company stated that it was past the 90 day warranty. Wanted to sell 6 valves for $25 plus shipping when I only needed one. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BOuell

customer_reviews.title: Terrible durability
customer_reviews.text: I changed to resistance filter and while applying pressure to put it on, the entire filter came out. So to try to remedy the issue, i held it in place from the inside to hold it stay and it broke and the plastic in the inside broke in half
customer_reviews.author: Jaleel Leeks

customer_reviews.title: Use the hell out of this
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not sure of the accuracy of simulating altitudes with varrying nozzles the mask is great for what I need. It can slip a bit when sweaty but nothing I can't handle while running. The mask does limit the amount of air coming in and makes it harder to breathe. I went a month running only with this mask and the next time I ran without it on I was cruising! Ran a 15:40 2 mile before and then after using the mask for a month my time was 13:20 2 mile.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Great product 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! It's really awesome and great for adding that extra little bit to your workouts/runs. I use it mostly to force my lungs to work harder which really help my breathing when I'm not wearing it. I've had and used it for years now and I would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Pieter C.

customer_reviews.title: Increased my capacity to breathe easier during my workouts; ...
customer_reviews.text: Increased my capacity to breathe easier during my workouts; and, my oxygen level intake has improved. My workouts are now at the 12,000 elevation level after one month; using it as I do TRX and while spinning. My swimming and running is improving with greater endurance and energy.
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Great for cardio! Remember to shave beard....
customer_reviews.text: Great for (stationary) conditioning, wouldn't recommend for strength/power training. The days I had a beard/long stubble, I would have to keep training to <10 minutes or else the sweat + hair would gradually move the mask away from the effective area. For trying to keep the mask in the same spot, training on a bike was the easiest, followed by elliptical, rowing and treadmill (which was the hardest).
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Lawless

customer_reviews.title: No problem
customer_reviews.text: It works I like it. Helps alot. I go on hikes and I use this to train before a hard hike. Helps.
customer_reviews.author: randy chao

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this mask
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mask. I trained with this daily for the September Spartan race in Killington. This worked great. On Race Day we climbed that mountain with no troubles. Absolutely GREAT! One thing is that I originally went with a medium and had to reorder with a large. Other then that it has been a great tool for training.
customer_reviews.author: Tablet User

customer_reviews.title: WoW
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great way to amp up your methods of exercising. This mask made my resistance increase exponentially. You should definitely try it if you want to increase your endurance and resistance. This is a tool to help you in every aspect. I highly recommend this to anyone looking to achieve that next level in your workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sizing issue
customer_reviews.text: The product works great and has certainly helped my stamina and lung capacity. The only reason for 4 stars is that a medium is too large for me. I usually have to get larger sizes in hats and helmets but this barely straps on tightly. When I sweat it gets loose and constantly needs dried off to avoid having the seal slip open. Medium tends to be a one size fits most so it needs to be smaller or have some sort of size listing
customer_reviews.author: dbruns

customer_reviews.title: A good trainer
customer_reviews.text: Good product, takes some getting used to, but time will help.
customer_reviews.author: G. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Start slowly and gradually  increase the resistance
customer_reviews.text: Awesome it really makes a difference when you work out
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Respiratory Muscle Training not Altitude
customer_reviews.text: I like the mask a lot, just as a note there is no real substitute for actual altitude training, stay away if that's what you want it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Bought to train for the high elevation of the Inca ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought to train for the high elevation of the Inca Trail. Works, but maybe works too well? Real life high elevation isn't nearly as tough to breathe in as this.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure u have no breathing restrictions
customer_reviews.text: I used it for building endurance. Tough getting use to, but builds you up fast.
customer_reviews.author: thomas barnes

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to create more stamina , and it work , very happy with my purchase ; if u looking forward for stamina , strength and performance This is one of the best products on the market
customer_reviews.author: Omar Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I would use this during my crossfit workouts. While I couldn't make it through an entire workout i could tell that my body could function at the same pace while keeping my breathing more steady and not as gaspy for air. I haven't stepped up to the higher levels, simply staying at the base level is good enough for me. I recommend it to everyone I workout with as it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Intense and functional. I have seen an increase in my air intake already, due to the use of this mask. Started off at 9,000 feet, learned real quickly that wasn't it. Dropped it to 3,000 then by three days I had it up to 6,000 feet. It works, dropped two minutes on my three mile run the very next week I ran.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Beaubrun

customer_reviews.title: This mask is the way to go if you need ...
customer_reviews.text: This mask is the way to go if you need to get to the next level. I am feeling more gassed out by the end of a 20-30 minute circuit or run than I used to with an hour or longer session. I feel my diaphragm and core are getting more engaged during workouts. The added benefit of lung capacity is just icing on the cake. Forewarning: you WILL get strange/worried looks as you run by people or cars!
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my boyfriend, he loves it!! He said he gives it ten stars LOL! Well worth the money!! As far as the size goes, we ordered a medium and it was perfect. He is 5'10 and 165lb
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is frickin cool.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this mask is really sweet, it helps you strengthen your diaphragm and enhance your breathing efficiency. I'm a six foot tall, 145 pound male, and the medium mask fits perfectly. Sometimes the flux valves get a little messed up, but overall pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't be scared
customer_reviews.text: This mask is awesome! Fits perfect and with all the extra valves I can choose which altitude I want to use for different situations. While breathing only I can raise the altitude, with yoga a little less. After a few days I already had felt the difference.
customer_reviews.author: frank villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the training mask, I struggled when I run, nowadays the mask gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: DJF

customer_reviews.title: Was a bit skeptical at first but it definitely made ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical at first but it definitely made my lungs stronger after a couple of weeks of running with it, I thought I as gonna die the first time using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Once I put this then on immediately noticed that I had to change my breath habits. I used it on a morning run and it seems like it really pushed my lungs and breath to a limit. I will say you should read the book that comes with this before doing any physical activity. Also, if you're a guy with facial hair they suggest you put Vaseline on to help keep it sealed properly.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mask. It is very versatile and light weight. It has multiple elevation settings which help with building endurance. I bought it for my husband, who uses it with his military training. He has raved about it so much that some of his buddies bought one and love theirs as well. I even tried it and have to say it helps with breathing for running.
customer_reviews.author: C.J

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Took some getting used to but its an amazing training tool to have i use my mask everyday in the gym i love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tooles

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best quality elevation training mask that I have used. The materials are of the highest quality with great durability and elasticity. I especially like its air circulation that allows me to breathe as easy as if not wearing a mask.
customer_reviews.author: Rainn Forrest

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product at first due to never having used an elevation mask but now I wear it every day I go to the gym and it has greatly improved my stamina and lung capacity. It is one of the best things I have every purchased and it is well worth the price. If you are looking to take your workouts to the next level I would HIGHLY recommend trying this product, it will change everything.
customer_reviews.author: Dominicc Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised... acts as a restrictor ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised...acts as a restrictor for breathing, causing the lungs to develop strength and more importantly, taught me to breathe deeply and controlled. Shallow breathing when taxed is what causes us to fatigue faster, so hoping this trains me to do the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Breathing training mask
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at Christmas for my son who needed to improved his respiratory function for sport endurance, he loves it. States he can tell the difference with his lung function for breathing/ training.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: This is the TRUTH If you want to take your ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the TRUTH If you want to take your training to the next level GET one. I swear by it, Training at 9000 feet in the gym at the moment running sprint at 6000 and doing speed/agility drills. Next Level training. :)
customer_reviews.author: clwtech1

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is killer!!! I have been using for two months now and am on the second dificulty setting running two miles six days a week (five days a week with mask). I can feel a huge difference in my breathing when running without. It feels like my breathing never gets nearly as laboured.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great way to train and get fit
customer_reviews.text: Great way to train and get fit! Started out just walking around with it and doing breathing exercises at the 18,000 level, (I live in Florida), and I already feel a difference in my running and biking. Going to start integrating it into biking and running more heavily and update this review in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: SlyCooper

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but
customer_reviews.text: Not a great design. It fits poorly, sliding down easily. You can order a free strap to hold up the sleeve from the parent company, but then it tends to tear the neoprene sleeve by the ears. I can't endorse it in its current state, due to longevity and fit of the mask. Wish i could, it's great for training.
customer_reviews.author: Poedonk

customer_reviews.title: Quality design, made for various types of physical training
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this to train for my Spartan races. Instead of keeping a high pace for long periods of time. I focus more on the bursts and spurts while maintaining a consistent a strong breathing pattern. Elevation training mask has helped me maintain a consistent breathing and I used this to manage my pace and strength over the course of my run. This mask lets me use it while I bike run and use the elliptical. Once you get used to the highest settings. Your progress will become exponential, at-least for me.
customer_reviews.author: b c

customer_reviews.title: could of been alot better for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was good for my cardio. Not happy with the price I paid. Costs too much and so does the cleaner and different sleeves. Should of just used my USMC gas mask instead....
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson
